markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mischievous Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=2544) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Skillful Tail (Ganzi)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2538)

</column>

---

Your tail can bedevil your foes. You can [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) creatures with your tail, even if you don't have a free hand. All restrictions of Skillful Tail otherwise continue to apply. If you have [Smashing Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=2535), your tail unarmed attack gains the [disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175) and [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) traits.
name: Mischievous Tail

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Mischievous Tail Source Ancestry Guide pg. 97 2.0 Prerequisites Skillful Tail (Ganzi) --- Your tail can bedevil your foes. You can Disarm and Trip creatures with your tail, even if you don't have a free hand. All restrictions of Skillful Tail otherwise continue to apply. If you have Smashing Tail, your tail unarmed attack gains the disarm and trip traits.
